author: sky.cactus
content:
Right.  The idea with privacy by default is that everyone who stakes would have their deposit and withdraws unlinked.  This has two very significant benefits over opt-in privacy layers:
1. Anonymity set is all validators.
2. It normalizes privacy as people will have to go out of their way to remove their privacy.
